snippet: The New York State Police, seemingly no closer to finding Richard W. Matt and David Sweat, abandoned a “grid search” and said they would instead pursue fresh leads.
abstract: New York State Police change strategy in search for escaped convicts Richard W Matt and David Sweat; drop 'grid search' method initially employed to refocus hunt in new areas in response to fresh leads and intelligence.

byline.original: By MICHAEL WINERIP and MICHAEL SCHWIRTZ
byline.contributor: Jesse McKinley contributed reporting from Albany, and Rick Rojas and Vivian Yee from Dannemora.

lead_paragraph: The New York State Police, seemingly no closer to finding Richard W. Matt and David Sweat, abandoned a “grid search” and said they would instead pursue fresh leads.

headline.main: Focus and Strategy Shift in Hunt for 2 Escaped Killers
headline.print_headline: Focus and Strategy Are Shifted in Search for 2 Escaped Killers
